hero.copy: 3 years of hands-on experience creating web apps with Node.js, React.js, and Next.js. Adept at architecting efficient and scalable software that deliver seamless user interactions.

projects.title: CRM
projects.description: Powerful CRM software tailor-made for e-commerce. Harnessing the prowess of React.js for seamless front-end experiences, D3.js for dynamic visualizations, and Node.js for robust back-end functionality. It helps the business drive growth and streamline customer management with ease.

projects.title: Blog
projects.description: A personal blog built with Next.js for fast responsiveness and MDX for a highly interactive reading experience.

awardStack.title: First Place & Best Code - Hackathon Citi Bank 2023
awardStack.description: My team and I beat the challenge of implementing a PIX billing validator software that follows the CNAB 750 standards by building a microservices architecture, hosted on the AWS Cloud, that is highly scalable and can process more than 100,000 requests per hour. We did that in the span of two days, and won the two highest awards.

contact.title: Reach Out
contact.text: I'm currently open for work, so if my skills and experience are in line with what you need for your project, please feel free to reach out. Or if you just want to have a chat, it's okay, too. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
